settings.label: Primary background color
settings.info: Primary background color for the store

settings.label: Primary foreground color
settings.info: For text used over the primary background color

settings.label: Secondary foreground color
settings.info: To highlight individual elements of text. Used over the primary background color

settings.label: Third foreground color
settings.info: To highlight individual elements of text. Used over the primary background color

settings.label: Fourth foreground color
settings.info: To highlight individual elements of text that are in the background

settings.label: Accent background color
settings.info:
Background for solid buttons, date picker, shopping cart, etc.

 Note: If the color is not set the company branding color will be applied.

settings.label: Accent background color on hover state
settings.info:
Background for solid buttons, date picker, shopping cart, etc. on hover.

 Note: If the color is not set the company branding color will be applied.

settings.label: Accent background color on active state
settings.info:
Background for solid buttons, date picker, shopping cart, etc. on click.

 Note: If the color is not set the company branding color will be applied.

settings.label: Accent foreground color
settings.info: For text used over the accent background color

settings.label: Links color
settings.info: For text links and non-solid buttons

settings.label: Placeholders color
settings.info: For placeholders of input fields

settings.label: Heading
settings.info: Font used for headers

settings.label: Body
settings.info: Font used for texts

settings.label: Header 1
settings.info: Use positive numbers between 40 and 80 only

settings.label: Header 2
settings.info: Use positive numbers between 30 and 70 only

settings.label: Header 3
settings.info: Use positive numbers between 25 and 65 only

settings.label: Header 4
settings.info: Use positive numbers between 20 and 50 only

settings.label: Header 5
settings.info: Use positive numbers between 18 and 32 only

settings.label: Header 6
settings.info: Use positive numbers between 16 and 26 only

settings.label: Duration
settings.info: Important note: Time counts in milliseconds, 1 second equals 1000 milliseconds. If this field is empty, by default, all animations use a 200ms duration. This time is used for changing colors of UI elements, opening menu, modals, etc. You can use positive numbers between 0 and 10000 only

settings.label: Use focal images
settings.info: Display point focused images for products instead of full sized

settings.label: Image placeholder
settings.info: This image displays on products and collections if they don't have any images
